content: For a discussion of risks and other important factors that could affect our actual results, please refer to our SEC filings available on the SEC's website including our quarterly report on Form 10-Q for the quarter ended September 30th, 2022 to be filed after this call in our Investor Relations website as well as the risks and other important factors discussed in today's earnings release. Our Q3 revenue of $51 million declined 1% versus last year, and our reported net income and adjusted EBITDA were both a loss of $10 million. I noted on our August earnings call that, we were baking in risks in our scenario planning for the second half, including continued end market declines in Q3, bottoming out in Q4 along with continued liquidity challenges for our clients.
